title: All-City Cosmic Stallion all-road endurance bike goes Titanium, amps up clearance
content:
All-City Cycles have traded in classic steel for raw titanium with the new Cosmic Stallion Ti gravel bike. Not only does it have a super lightweight frameset, it also gets improved tire clearance for your most demanding all-road journeying. With All-City custom titanium dropouts and a Columbus Futura Cross carbon fork, this ride looks sweet […]

The post All-City Cosmic Stallion all-road endurance bike goes Titanium, amps up clearance appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
